languages.text: "Род Драйвстем, желающий расширить свое влияние. Род Гапрак, потерявший авторитет после краха Кьявы Гамма". {n}Зауэрбэк оборачивается на свое семейство, затем вновь обращается к вам.{/n} "Зауэрбэк, чей глава чрезмерно прямолинеен в общении с Вольным Торговцем. Мотивы устроить заговор против вас могут быть у кого угодно, так же, как их может не быть вовсе. Куда важнее, сколь искренними были клятвы, принесенные вам вашими подданными".

traits.locale_text: "Род Драйвстем, желающий усилить свое внимание. Род Гапрак, потерявший влияние после краха Кьява-Гаммы". {n}Зауэрбек оборачивается на свое семейство, затем вновь обращается к вам.{/n} "Зауэрбек, чей глава чрезмерно прямолинеен в общении с Вольным Торговцем. Мотивы устроить заговор против вас могут быть у кого у годно, так же, как их может не быть вовсе. Куда важнее, сколь искренними были клятвы, принесенные вам вашими подданными".
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "House Drivestem, wishing to expand their clout. House Gaprak, who lost their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too direct in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone could have a reason to conspire against you, and equally, they could have none. It is not a question of motive, but of loyalty: each of your subjects has sworn an oath of loyalty to you, so whose sincerity do you doubt?"
languages.original_text: "Род Драйвстем, желающий усилить свое внимание. Род Гапрак, потерявший влияние после краха Кьявы Гамма". {n}Зауэрбэк оборачивается на свое семейство, затем вновь обращается к вам.{/n} "Зауэрбэк, чей глава чрезмерно прямолинеен в общении с Вольным Торговцем. Мотивы устроить заговор против вас могут быть у кого угодно, так же, как их может не быть вовсе. Куда важнее, сколь искренними были клятвы, принесенные вам вашими подданными".

traits.locale_text: "House Drivestem, wishing to deepen their influence. House Gaprak, losing their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too straightforward in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone can have the motive to conspire against you, and no one can have any. It is more important to know how sincere were the oaths sworn by your subjects to you."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "House Drivestem, wishing to deepen their influence. Anyone can have the motive to conspire against you, and no one can have any. It is more important to know how sincere were the oaths sworn by your subjects to you."

House Gaprak, who lost their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too direct in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone could have a reason to conspire against you, and equally, they could have none. It is not a question of motive, but of loyalty: each of your subjects has sworn an oath of loyalty to you, so whose sincerity do you doubt?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: 「ドライブステム家は己の影響力を高めようと考えています。ギャプラック家は、キアヴァ・ガンマの事故以来、影響力を失っています」{n}ザウアーバックは自分の家族の方を見てから、再びあなたに向き直る。{/n}「ザウアーバック家は、自由開拓者に率直に物を言いすぎる教父がいます。陛下に逆らう陰謀を企てる可能性は誰にでもあり、誰にもないということです。それは動機の問題ではなく、忠誠心の問題なのです。あなたの臣下はそれぞれあなたに忠誠を誓っています。では、あなたは誰の忠誠を疑うのですか？」
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, wishing to expand their clout. House Gaprak, who lost their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too direct in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone could have a reason to conspire against you, and equally, they could have none. It is not a question of motive, but of loyalty: each of your subjects has sworn an oath of loyalty to you, so whose sincerity do you doubt?"

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステム家は己の影響力を高めようと考えています。ギャプラック家は、キアヴァ・ガンマの事故以来、影響力を失っています」{n}ザウアーバックは自分の家族の方を見てから、再びあなたに向き直る。{/n}「ザウアーバック家は、自由開拓者に率直に物を言いすぎる教父がいます。陛下に逆らう陰謀を企てる可能性は誰にでもあり、誰にもないということです。それは動機の問題ではなく、忠誠心の問題なのです。あなたの臣下はそれぞれあなたに忠誠を誓っています。では、あなたは誰の忠誠を疑うのですか？」
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: “德莱夫斯塔家族，他们希望扩大自身的势力。贾帕克家族，他们在基亚瓦伽马星事件后失去了影响力。”{n}苏尔贝克转头看了一眼他的族人，又望向你。{/n}“苏尔贝克家族，因为他们的族长在与行商浪人说话时心直口快，从不拐弯抹角。任何人都有理由、也可能没有理由谋反。这件事情最重要的并不是动机，而是忠诚本身。您的每位臣民都曾宣誓效忠您，在这种情况下，您打算怀疑谁的忠诚呢？”
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, wishing to expand their clout. House Gaprak, who lost their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too direct in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone could have a reason to conspire against you, and equally, they could have none. It is not a question of motive, but of loyalty: each of your subjects has sworn an oath of loyalty to you, so whose sincerity do you doubt?"

traits.locale_text: “德莱夫斯塔家族，他们希望扩大自身的势力。贾帕克家族，他们在基亚瓦伽马星事件后失去了影响力。”{n}苏尔贝克转头看了一眼他的族人，又望向你。{/n}“苏尔贝克家族，因为他们的族长在与行商浪人说话时心直口快，从不拐弯抹角。任何人都有理由、也可能没有理由谋反。这件事情最重要的并不是动机，而是忠诚本身。您的每位臣民都曾宣誓效忠您，在这种情况下，您打算怀疑谁的忠诚呢？”
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: « La maison Drivestem, pour asseoir son autorité. La maison Gaprak, pour regagner en influence après l'incident de Kiava Gamma. » {n}Macharius jette un coup d'œil rapide à sa famille.{/n} « La maison Sauerback, dont le patriarche fait preuve de bien trop de franchise lorsqu'il s'adresse {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Tout le monde peut avoir une raison de conspirer contre vous. Ou aucune. Ce n'est pas une question de mobile, mais de loyauté : si chacun de vos sujets vous a juré fidélité, lesquels vous ont donné des raisons de douter de leur sincérité ? »
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, wishing to expand their clout. House Gaprak, who lost their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too direct in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone could have a reason to conspire against you, and equally, they could have none. It is not a question of motive, but of loyalty: each of your subjects has sworn an oath of loyalty to you, so whose sincerity do you doubt?"

traits.locale_text: « La maison Drivestem, pour asseoir son autorité. La maison Gaprak, pour regagner en influence après l'incident de Kiava Gamma. » {n}Macharius jette un coup d'œil rapide à sa famille.{/n} « La maison Sauerback, dont le patriarche fait preuve de bien trop de franchise lorsqu'il s'adresse {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Tout le monde peut avoir une raison de conspirer contre vous. Ou aucune. Ce n'est pas une question de mobile, mais de loyauté : si chacun de vos sujets vous a juré fidélité, lesquels vous ont donné des raisons de douter de leur sincérité ? »
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: «La casa Drivestem, intentando extender su influencia. La casa Gaprak, que busca recuperar su poder después del incidente en Kiava Gamma». {n}Sauerback se gira hacia su familia y luego te mira de nuevo.{/n} «La casa Sauerback, cuyo patriarca es demasiado directo para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Cualquiera podría tener razones para conspirar contra usted, o no. Lo que está en duda no son sus motivos sino la lealtad. Todos sus súbditos le han jurado fidelidad. La pregunta, entonces, es la siguiente: ¿Quién cree usted que no fue sincero al jurar servirle?».
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, wishing to expand their clout. House Gaprak, who lost their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too direct in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone could have a reason to conspire against you, and equally, they could have none. It is not a question of motive, but of loyalty: each of your subjects has sworn an oath of loyalty to you, so whose sincerity do you doubt?"

traits.locale_text: «La casa Drivestem, intentando extender su influencia. La casa Gaprak, que busca recuperar su poder después del incidente en Kiava Gamma». {n}Sauerback se gira hacia su familia y luego te mira de nuevo.{/n} «La casa Sauerback, cuyo patriarca es demasiado directo para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Cualquiera podría tener razones para conspirar contra usted, o no. Lo que está en duda no son sus motivos sino la lealtad. Todos sus súbditos le han jurado fidelidad. La pregunta, entonces, es la siguiente: ¿Quién cree usted que no fue sincero al jurar servirle?».
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Haus Drivestem will seine Macht ausweiten. Haus Gaprak, das nach dem Zwischenfall auf Kiava Gamma an Einfluss verloren hat." {n}Sauerback blickt über seine Schulter zu seiner Familie und dreht sich dann wieder zu dir.{/n} "Haus Sauerback, dessen Patriarch zu direkt in seiner Kommunikation mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ist. Sie alle könnten einen Grund haben, gegen Euch zu konspirieren, sie könnten aber ebenso gut keinen Grund haben. Es ist keine Frage des Motivs, sondern der Loyalität: Alle Eure Untertanen haben Euch einen Treueeid geschworen, an wessen Aufrichtigkeit zweifelt Ihr also?"
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, wishing to expand their clout. House Gaprak, who lost their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too direct in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone could have a reason to conspire against you, and equally, they could have none. It is not a question of motive, but of loyalty: each of your subjects has sworn an oath of loyalty to you, so whose sincerity do you doubt?"

traits.locale_text: "Haus Drivestem will seinen Einfluss erweitern. Haus Gaprak verliert seinen Einfluss nach dem Zwischenfall auf Kiava Gamma." {n}Sauerback blickt über seine Schulter zu seiner Familie und dreht sich dann wieder zu dir.{/n} "Haus Sauerback, dessen Patriarch zu direkt in seiner Kommunikation mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ist. Jeder kann einen Grund haben, sich gegen Euch zu verschwören, und jeder kann auch keinen haben. Wichtiger ist die Frage, wie aufrichtig Eure Untertanen waren, als sie ihren Eid auf Euch geschworen haben."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "İlk olarak nüfuzunu genişletmek isteyen Drivestem Hanesi akla geliyor. Bir de Kiava Gama'da olanlardan sonra güçten düşen Gaprak Hanesi var." {n}Sauerback, hanesinin mensuplarına bakıp tekrar sana dönüyor.{/n} "Reisi, Hür Tacir'le haddinden daha açık sözlü konuştuğu için Sauerback Hanesi de olabilir. Herkesin size ihanet etmek için bir nedeni olabilir. Öte yandan olmayabilir de. Mesele saikle değil, sadakat. Her bir tebaanız size sadakat yemini etti. Kimin samimiyetinden şüphe duyuyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, wishing to expand their clout. House Gaprak, who lost their influence after the Kiava Gamma incident." {n}Sauerback looks back at his family, then turns to you again.{/n} "House Sauerback, whose patriarch is too direct in his communication with the Rogue Trader. Anyone could have a reason to conspire against you, and equally, they could have none. It is not a question of motive, but of loyalty: each of your subjects has sworn an oath of loyalty to you, so whose sincerity do you doubt?"

traits.locale_text: "İlk olarak nüfuzunu genişletmek isteyen Drivestem Hanesi akla geliyor. Bir de Kiava Gama'da olanlardan sonra güçten düşen Gaprak Hanesi var." {n}Sauerback, hanesinin mensuplarına bakıp tekrar sana dönüyor.{/n} "Önderi, Hür Tacir'le haddinden daha açık sözlü konuştuğu için Sauerback Hanesi de olabilir. Herkesin size ihanet etmek için bir nedeni olabilir. Öte yandan olmayabilir de. Konu saikle değil, sadakatle ilgili. Tebaanızdaki herkes size sadakat yemini etti. Kimin samimiyetinden şüphe duyuyorsunuz? Önemli olan o."
traits.speaker: Zaurback
